sentences.en: And Esau went to the field to hunt venison, and to bring it.
sentences.cn: 以扫往田野去打猎,要得野味带来.

sentences.en: And Isaac loved Esau, because he did eat of his venison : but Rebekah loved Jacob.
sentences.cn: 28以撒爱以扫, 因为常吃他的 野味.利百加却爱雅各.

sentences.en: Culinary suggestions Side of beef with boletus mushrooms. Wild boar , venison. Roast duck with cherries.
sentences.cn: 配餐建议:蘑菇配单面牛肉. 野生鹿肉, 烤鸭配樱桃.

sentences.en: His appetite for venison seems to be inappeasable.
sentences.cn: 他对鹿肉的嗜好似乎是永远无法满足.

sentences.en: However, it is certain that they had venison.
Some of the commercially produced venison resembles beef in flavour.
sentences.cn: 有些商业化养殖的鹿肉味道和牛肉很相似。

sentences.en: Talbuk Venison can now be used with the addition of Recipe: Talbuk Steak.
sentences.cn: 随着新配方: 巨鹿肉排的加入,巨鹿肉现在可以食用了.

sentences.en: The guards occasionally improved their rather sparse rations by the addition of a little venison.
sentences.cn: 这些卫兵时而要弄点鹿肉来改善一下那低劣的伙食.

sentences.en: The haunch of venison is delicious.
The hunter entertained us with venison which was very delicious.
sentences.cn: 猎人拿出了非常美味的鹿肉招待我们.

sentences.en: The Seapalahotel takes giving birth to the fierce seafood and venison as characteristic mainly.
sentences.cn: 海上皇宫假日酒店主要以生猛海鲜及野味为特色.

sentences.en: Their food was venison , wilder turkey, and fish.
sentences.cn: 鹿肉 、 野火鸡和鱼都是他们的食物.

sentences.en: They had a wonderful lunch of salmon salad and roast venison.
sentences.cn: 他们吃了一顿很棒的午餐，有鲑鱼沙拉和烤鹿肉。

sentences.en: Venison is a very lean form of meat.
Venison is considered a delicacy by many.
sentences.cn: 许多人认为鹿肉是珍贵佳肴.

sentences.en: Venison is the meat from what animal?
sentences.cn: 鹿肉是哪一种动物身上的肉?
